subject: Order #SSN4251 - Stuck at delivery step for more than 10 days
description_text:

conversations.body_text: Hi Victor Leroux,       The shipment is temporarily delayed in transit. We have already contacted the carrier and are waiting for their response.  We will update you as soon as there is any progress. Thank you for your patience.

Hi,

Your reply was 7 days ago and my parcel has been stuck for 20 days now. Do
you have any update on this?

Thank you,
Victor Leroux
